entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
